name: A Strange Mushroom
options: Trade It for Something: Gain a Neutral Item.
(If you have a Bushel) Add It to Your Bushel: Add +20 Heal to your Bushel.
(If you are Mak) Brew a Potion: Get a small Silver-tier Potion

name: Artisan Dunes
options: Apprentice Weaponsmith: Give your leftmost Weapon +5 Damage.
Apprentice Flamewright: Your leftmost Burn item gains +1 Burn.
Apprentice Banehand: Your leftmost Poison item gains +1 Poison.
(5) Find Better Craftsman: Double the effects of the offered options.

name: BazaarCON
options: Artist Alley: Get a Diamond-tier item from the Bazaar.
Swag Collector: Get 3 Small items from the Bazaar.
Self promotion: (if you have a Business Card) Gain 3 XP.

name: Bounty Hunters Event
options: Escape to the sea: (if you have Flagship or Submarine) Gain 5 XP

name: Celestial Conduit
options: Enchant an item with Cannot be Frozen, Slowed or Destroyed.

name: Dabora
options: Treasure Location: Get a random item.

name: Deadly Duel
options: Fight a random Monster from your current day or the next day, of any rarity.

name: Dooleyâ€™s Workshop
options: Find a friend: Choose a free Friend
Firmware upgrade: Upgrade the Core and gain +10% Max Health.
Improve Friendship: Upgrade your leftmost Friend.

name: Eating Contest
options: Basic Chocolate Bars: Get 5 bronze Chocolate Bars.
(5) Deluxe Chocolate Bars: Get 5 silver Chocolate Bars.
(10) Premium Chocolate Bars: Get 5 Gold-tier Chocolate Bars.

name: Economic Seminar
options: Get an Economic item or skill.

name: Epic Battle
options: Fight a random Monster from your current day or the next day, of any rarity.

name: Finn's Big Bite
options: Guardian's Gravy Plate: You gain 5% Max Health and your Shield items gain Shield 10.
Restorative Risotto: You gain 5% Max Health and your Heal items gain Heal 10.
Vitality Stew: You gain 5% Max Health and 5 Regeneration.

name: Form
options: Exploit: Give your leftmost Weapon +25% Crit Chance.
(5) Sharpen Weapon: Your Weapons gain 10 Damage.
(10) Upgrade an item: Upgrade your leftmost Weapon.

name: Frozen Tomb
options: Enchant an item with Freeze effects.

name: Futura
options: Fate's Bounty - Gain 20 Gold and 5 XP.
Fate's Crossroads - Visit a random enchantment location. (Choose either a random Enchantment or The Artist)
Fate's Legacy - Choose a free Diamond-tier item.

name: Genie Lamp Event
options: Wish for Immortality: Gain 5% Max Health.

name: Guardian's Gorge
options: Enchant an item with Shield effects.

name: Gumball Machine Event
options: (1) Get a gumball (repeatedable up to 10 gumballs)

name: Haddy
options: Enchanted Item: Gain a random enchanted item.
Gold Skill: Gain a Gold-tier skill.
Diamond Skill: Gain a Diamond-tier skill.
Mystery Bundle: Get 3 Diamond-tier Loot Items.
Magician's Top Hat: Get Magician's Top Hat.

name: Hospital
options: Get a Heal or Regeneration item.

name: Investment Pitch
options: Hard Assets: Upgrade your leftmost Property
Appreciated Value: Double the value of your leftmost item

name: Jules' Cafe
options: Relax: Gain 10% of your Max Health for the rest of the day.
Rejuvenating Blend: Your Heal item gain Heal 50 for the rest of the day.
Strong Brew: Your Weapons gain 25 Damage for the rest of the day.

name: Jungle Ruins
options: Grab the Loot: Gain 2 Bronze-tier loot items.
(if you are Vanessa) Plunder for Treasure: Gain a Small Silver-tier item.
(if you are Pygmalien) Setup Tourist Attraction: Gain 2 Income
(if you are Mak) Hunt for Reagents: Get a Silver-tier Reagent.

name: Languid Dunes
options: Enchant an item with Slow effects.

name: Likit
options: 4/8. Candy Mail. Adjacent Shield items permanently gain +Shield 1/2. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo and destroys this if it has 0 Max Ammo.
4/8. Epicurean Chocolate. Adjacent Weapons items permanently gain +1/2 Damage. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo and destroys this if it has 0 Max Ammo.
4/8. Super Syrup. Adjacent items permanently gain 1/2% Crit chance. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo and destroys this if it has 0 Max Ammo.

name: Lost and Found
options: Get a small non Weapon item.

name: Mandala
options: Transform Small: Transform your leftmost Small item into another item of the same size and tier.
Transform Medium: Transform your leftmost Medium item into another item of the same size and tier.
Transform Large: Transform your leftmost Large item into another item of the same size and tier.

name: Medicine Cabinet
options: Get a small Heal or Regeneration item.

name: Monster Ranch
options: Choose 1 free item from a selection of 5 Loot Items.

name: Mountain Pass
options: Guide the Convoy: Gain 2 Gold and 1 XP
Work for the Convoy: Gain 5 Gold
Escort the Convoy: Risky! Anything could happen here. A fight with a monster that can be found on the current day or the next. It was uneventful: Gain 1 XP. Treasure Chest: Get an item.
Invest in the Convoy: Pay 1 Gold for 2 Income

name: Murkwood Bayou
options: Enchant an item with Poison effects.

name: Regenerative Tincture
options: Gain Regeneration equal to your level.

name: Relax
options: Start your next fight with 100 Shield per Level.

options: 10. Seek Health: Gain 200 to 600 Max Health.

name: Street Festival
options: Hero 1: Purchase an item from this Hero
Hero 2: Purchase an item from this Hero
Hero 3: Purchase an item from this Hero

name: The Cult
options: Steal Dagger: Get a Gold Ritual Dagger.
Blood Price: Lose 10% Max Health and gain 25 Regeneration.
Deadly Covenant: Lose 20% Max Health and enchant your leftmost Weapon with Deadly (Crit Chance).
Vital Sacrifice: Lose 30% Max Health and get a Diamond-tier Runic Double Bow.

name: The Docks
options: Work as Security: Gain 2 Gold and a Weapon.
Work as Dockhand: Gain 2 Gold and a Tool.
Work as Maintenance: Gain 2 Gold and a Shield item.
Work as Navigator: (if you have an Astrolabe) Gain 5 Gold and 1 XP.
Work as Navigator: (if you have a Star Chart) Gain 5 Gold and 1 XP.

name: The Lost Crate
options: Open It: Get a Medium Item.

name: Thieves Guild
options: Raid the Vault: Grab everything from The Vault

name: Tiny Furry Monster
options: Scare It: Get a Silver-tier Loot item.
(If you have a Food item) Feed it: Gain 1 XP.
(If you have a Friend item) Play with it: Gain 1 XP.
(If you have a Toy) Play with it: Gain 1 XP.

name: Tranquil Spring
options: Enchant an item with Heal effects.
